name: Memoria (itch) (OshDubh, Dizzydwarf500)
description:
Relive the nostalgia of the past by revisiting your memories, preserved by VHS.

Controls

  1. W and Space: jump
  2. D: Right Movement
  3. A: Left Movement
  4. S: Down Movement (edited)
  5. F10: Full screen Toggle
  6. F9: skip cutscene (edited)
  7. Z or J: Dash
